code: import React from'react';import{Grid,Paper}from'@material-ui/core';import ArrowForwardIosIcon from'@material-ui/icons/ArrowForwardIos';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import useStyles from'./styles';import{getInvoice}from'../../../actions/invoices';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Invoice=function Invoice(_ref){var invoice=_ref.invoice;var classes=useStyles({invoice:invoice});var dispatch=useDispatch();var invoiceId=invoice._id.slice(18);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Paper,{className:classes.root,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:1,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:10,sm:2,className:classes.boldFont,children:"#".concat(invoiceId)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:6,sm:3,className:classes.lightFont,children:"Due ".concat(invoice.paymentDue)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:6,sm:2,className:classes.lightFont,children:invoice.clientName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:6,sm:2,className:classes.boldFont,children:"$".concat(invoice.total)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:4,sm:2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.status,children:invoice.status})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:2,sm:1,className:classes.icon,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/invoices/".concat(invoice._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowForwardIosIcon,{fontSize:"small",color:"primary",onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(getInvoice(invoice._id));}})})})]})});};export default Invoice;
